metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10245 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Insufficient sanitization of the query parameter in templates/html/search_opensearch.php could lead to reflected cross-site scripting or iframe injection.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

doxygen - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-doxyparse - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-gui - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-latex - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: doxygen package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.13-10ubuntu1').
quantlib-refman-html package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
